about.description:
PyRTF is a pure python module for the efficient generation of rich text
format documents. Supports styles, tables, cell merging, jpg and png images
and tries to maintain compatibility with as many RTF readers as possible.
This is a modified copy of version 0.45 that is compatible with both Python
2 and 3.
about.summary: PyRTF - Rich Text Format Document Generation

about.description:
PyRTF is a pure python module for the efficient generation of rich text
format documents. Supports styles, tables, cell merging, jpg and png images
and tries to maintain compatibility with as many RTF readers as possible.
This is a modified copy of version 0.45 that is compatible with both Python
2 and 3.
about.summary: PyRTF - Rich Text Format Document Generation

name: pyrtf
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "PyRTF" %}
{% set version = "0.45" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/phenix-lbl/PyRTF/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a9219f8a006a626a1ac739b860119193a9e0b874838bbcbb229c56f06e118d57

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 3
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} setup.py install"

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - future
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - future

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - PyRTF

about:
  home: http://pyrtf.sourceforge.net/
  license: LGPL-2.1
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'PyRTF - Rich Text Format Document Generation'
  description: |
    PyRTF is a pure python module for the efficient generation of rich text
    format documents. Supports styles, tables, cell merging, jpg and png images
    and tries to maintain compatibility with as many RTF readers as possible.
    This is a modified copy of version 0.45 that is compatible with both Python
    2 and 3.
  doc_url: http://pyrtf.sourceforge.net
  dev_url: https://github.com/phenix-lbl/PyRTF.git

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bkpoon
